byline.original: By JESSE McKINLEY and VIVIAN YEE

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is seeking to close a loophole that allows almost unlimited amounts of money to flow to political candidates.

headline.print_headline: Cuomo Offers 8 Bills to Cap Contributions From L.L.C.s
headline.main: Cuomo Offers 8 Bills to Cap Contributions From L.L.C.s

snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo is seeking to close a loophole that allows almost unlimited amounts of money to flow to political candidates.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew Cuomo presents package of eight bills aimed at eliminating so-called LLC loophole, which allows donors to funnel nearly unlimited donations to political candidates through multiple limited liability companies; Republican lawmakers say package fails to address larger corruption issue.
